Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server.GenericServer
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server.Socket.SocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateListener, Serializable, Remote
public class SocketServer extends GenericServer

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServer

      public SocketServer(ServerSocket listenSocket) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a SocketServer object with the specified ServerSocket. Initializes the server with the provided listening socket and starts the heartbeat mechanism to handle server communication.
      Parameters:
      listenSocket - the server socket used to listen for incoming connections
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(String[] args) throws IOException
      Starts the server and listens for incoming client connections. For each new connection, it initializes the input and output streams, assigns a unique identifier to the client, and manages client handling in a separate thread.
      Overrides:
      start in class GenericServer
      Parameters:
      args - an array of strings containing any command-line arguments passed to the program
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accepting connections or interacting with streams

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the server and releases all associated resources. This method performs the following actions: 1. Notifies all connected clients of the server shutdown. 2. Shuts down the heartbeat mechanism for managing client connections. 3. Clears the client-to-match mapping data structure. 4. Closes the listening socket to terminate incoming connection handling. Any exceptions during client notifications or socket closure are caught and ignored to ensure the method completes its primary objective.
      Overrides:
      stop in class GenericServer

    • createGame

      public void createGame(int level, UUID provisionalId, int numplayer, String nickname)
      Creates a new game with the specified configuration and associates it with the corresponding players.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of the game to be created
      provisionalId - a temporary unique identifier for the game session
      numplayer - the number of players in the game
      nickname - the nickname of the player initiating the game

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(String playerNickname, int numPlayers, UUID matchId, UUID provisionalId)
      Handles the process of a player joining a game using their provisional ID. It updates the provisional match's client handlers, replaces the provisional match ID with the actual match ID, and initiates the game joining process.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player who is joining the game
      numPlayers - the total number of players in the game
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match the player is joining
      provisionalId - the provisional identifier of the match before it begins

    • activeGames

      public void activeGames(UUID provisionalId)
      Identifies active games that have available player slots and sends the list of these games to clients in the lobby associated with the given provisional ID.
      Parameters:
      provisionalId - the unique identifier for the lobby of clients who will receive the list of games with open slots

    • onError

      public void onError(UUID matchId)
      Handles an error event associated with the specified match identifier. For each client associated with the match, this method invokes the error handler. Exceptions thrown during the handling of errors are silently ignored.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match for which the error occurred

    • updateGameCreated

      public void updateGameCreated(int level, List<Deck> decks, ArrayList<Player> players, int hourglass, int surrender, UUID matchId)
      Updates the game creation details for the specified match and informs all clients connected to the match.
      Parameters:
      level - the difficulty level of the game
      decks - the list of decks available in the game
      players - the list of players participating in the game
      hourglass - the initial hourglass value for the game
      surrender - the surrender limit for the game
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match

    • depositThingInHand

      public void depositThingInHand(String nickname, UUID matchId)
      Deposits the item currently held by the specified player into the appropriate storage based on the ongoing match context.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose held item is to be deposited
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match in which the action is performed

    • pickTileLMR

      public void pickTileLMR(int index, String nickname, UUID matchId)
      Executes the pickTileLMR action for all clients associated with the provided match.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the tile to be picked
      nickname - the nickname of the player performing the action
      matchId - the unique identifier for the match in which the action is taking place

    • insertTileLMR

      public void insertTileLMR(int index, int r, int c, int rot, String nickname, UUID matchId)
      Inserts a tile with the specified parameters into the game for the given match.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the tile to insert
      r - the row position where the tile will be placed
      c - the column position where the tile will be placed
      rot - the rotation value of the tile
      nickname - the nickname associated with the player inserting the tile
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match

    • pickLittleDeckLMR

      public void pickLittleDeckLMR(int deckIndex, String nickname, UUID matchId)
      Allows a client to pick a little deck in a match using the provided deck index and nickname.
      Parameters:
      deckIndex - the index of the deck to be picked
      nickname - the nickname of the player choosing the deck
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match in which the deck is being picked

    • addAlienOrHumansLMR

      public void addAlienOrHumansLMR(String nickname, boolean wantAlien, AlienColor color, int row, int col, UUID matchId)
      Adds an alien or human object to the game based on the provided parameters. This method is typically used in the context of multiplayer matches to update all clients about the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player adding the alien or human
      wantAlien - true if an alien should be added, false for a human
      color - the color of the alien being added, applicable only if wantAlien is true
      row - the row position where the alien or human is to be added
      col - the column position where the alien or human is to be added
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match where the alien or human is being added

    • messageToChooseSubship

      public void messageToChooseSubship(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Sends a message to the client to prompt the selection of a subship. This method is used to notify a specific player associated with a given match ID, instructing them to choose a subship from the provided list of options.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is to choose a subship.
      subShips - A list of available subship options, represented as nested lists of SpaceShipTile objects.
      matchId - The unique identifier of the match associated with the player's action.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while sending the message to the client.

    • ChooseSubship

      public void ChooseSubship(String nickname, ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, int choice, int waste, UUID matchId) throws Exception
      Allows a player to select a subship for the match.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player choosing the subship
      subShips - a list of available subships represented as a 2D ArrayList of SpaceShipTile objects
      choice - the index of the chosen subship from the list
      waste - an integer value representing the waste associated with the choice
      matchId - the unique identifier of the match
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs in the subship selection process

      matchId - the unique identifier of the match to disconnect all clients from

    • notEnoughGoods

      public void notEnoughGoods(Player player, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Notifies the client that there are not enough goods associated with the given player and UUID.
      Parameters:
      player - the player object containing information about the user
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the client
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while notifying the client

    • removeAlien

      public void removeAlien(String username, int r, int c, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Removes an alien specified by its position and username, applying the operation to multiple clients identified by the provided UUID.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the alien to be removed
      r - the row position of the alien
      c - the column position of the alien
      uuid - the unique identifier for the associated clients to apply the removal operation
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the removal process

    • lostBatteries

      public void lostBatteries(Player p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesToAct, UUID uuid) throws Exception
      Notifies the clients of a player losing specified batteries and handles the respective actions.
      Parameters:
      p - the player who lost the batteries
      batteriesToAct - a nested list of integers representing the batteries to process
      uuid - the unique identifier for the associated client
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the notification process
